dict.string: NutriSync needs camera access to capture photos of your meals for nutrition analysis.
NutriSync needs photo library access to select meal photos for nutrition analysis.
NutriSync reads health data to provide personalized nutrition recommendations based on your activity and biometrics.
NutriSync writes nutrition data to Health to track your dietary intake alongside other health metrics.
NutriSync uses the microphone for voice descriptions of meals to improve analysis accuracy.
NutriSync sends timely reminders for your meal windows and check-ins to help you stay on track with your nutrition goals.
